inclusion.criterion: Carotid endarterectomy not within 2 days (48 hours) of randomization
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Not attending at least one of visits 3 (24 hours after CEA), 4 (30 days after CEA), or 5 (1 year after CEA)
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Subject has been participating in another clinical trial within last 6 weeks
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Subject has any other medical condition that would make him/her inappropriate for study participation, in the Investigator opinion
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of CAD s/p CABG and PVD with significant bilateral carotid stenosis. He reports occasional dizziness but no prior syncope or sensory/motor defects.
